name: TxDOT Form Filler
description: Auto-fills TxDOT compliance forms from your data, eliminating manual entry across dozens of fields
longDescription:
Automates the tedious process of filling out Texas Department of Transportation compliance forms. Feed it your project data in a simple CSV format, and it generates completed PDF forms ready for submission.

Supports the most common TxDOT forms including:
- DBE Commitment Agreement
- Monthly Employment Utilization Report
- Material/Supplier Certification
- Subcontractor Payment Verification

The script validates all required fields before generating output to catch errors before submission.
instructions:
1. Install Python 3.10 or later
2. Install dependencies: pip install -r requirements.txt
3. Prepare your project data CSV (see sample_data.csv for format)
4. Run: python form_filler.py --input your_data.csv --form dbe_commitment
5. Completed forms are saved to the output/ directory as PDFs
